message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,700,000. It's a significant investment, but I believe the value it brings to your business will make it worthwhile.  Let's discuss!
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,300,000 doesn't quite reflect the value this product brings. How about $1,600,000? It's a significant price reduction from my initial offer, but it still allows for a healthy profit margin for both of us. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000. This reflects the significant value this product will bring to your business, while still allowing me to meet my financial goals.  Let's find a solution that works for both of us.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
